title: Dark Valley
description: When film executive Gavin Smith vanishes, Los Angeles detectives search for clues amid reported sightings and suspicious circumstances. The case takes a dramatic turn when Gavin's wife reveals painful secrets. Keith Morrison reports.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
